explains: adj. [生理] 冷血的；残酷的，无情的；怕冷的

sentences.en: Cold-blooded animals were used to test this hypothesis.
sentences.cn: 冷血动物被用来验证这一假设。

sentences.en: Their cold-blooded killers had then dragged their lifeless bodies upstairs to the bathroom.
sentences.cn: 那些杀死他们的冷血杀手们随后把他们的尸体拖到了楼上的浴室。

sentences.en: The killing was cold-blooded, and those who committed this atrocity should be tried and punished.
sentences.cn: 这场杀戮非常残酷，那些犯下此暴行的人应该受到审判和惩罚。
